articles.title: Apple ditched price hike on iPhone 14: ‘they can maintain margins’
articles.content:
The iPhone 14 is here – and it’s uniquely more exciting for the consumers since Apple Inc (NASDAQ: AAPL) decided in favour of not raising the price of its new handset in the United States. Could that result in a hit to margins? Price hike is a broadly used tool that helps businesses offset the […]

articles.title: Alphabet (GOOGL) Bolsters Map Offerings With Latest Feature
articles.content: Alphabet's (GOOGL) Google adds a feature to Google Maps, letting users know the most fuel-efficient route on vehicle's engine type specification. It also rolls out eco-friendly routing in Europe.
